attributes.action: Create legislation to stop non direct debit charges to customers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Prevent companies charging people for not using direct debit to pay accounts. This is a Fine against people who do not have bank accounts, usually those on basic State pension or other low income families. People are being billed for paying their bills.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
